title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY: True Crimes That Inspired Roanoke
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: This for me is the Scariest season. They did not step back on the horror.

This season gets a lot of unnecessary hate...this is one of the most well made season imo . Loved the documentry take , and the constant egde-of-the-seat  experience I got from each episode. It was terrifying yet somehow hilarious at the same time
this series is one of the only things keeping me going to be honest <3
Honey Kathy Bates carries every movie and show she’s in she’s such an amazing actress and if it wasn’t for her ahs wouldn’t be nearly as iconic and amazing as it is
YES! This season freaked me out the most with all of the cannibalism, but it was still a great season!! Also, could you pin my comment, it's my birthday 😁
description:
Here are the true stories that inspired major plot points in AHS Roanoke including The Lost Colony, The Butcher and those murderous nurses Bridget and Miranda Jane.

In this video, Greg breaks down how AHS Season 6's most terrifying mystery: The Lost Colony of Roanoke. Plus, is The Butcher based on real life?

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
